example.quote: "He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive." — Seneca
example.insight: This quote from Seneca reminds us of the importance of living our lives to the fullest and not being held back by the fear of the inevitable. Each day is an opportunity to make meaningful contributions, face our fears, and grow beyond them.
example.advice: Today, take a moment to reflect on what fears might be holding you back from achieving your goals. Identify one small step you can take to confront and overcome one of those fears.
